summary: Implements mock models and backend logic for the AWS CloudWatch Logs service, providing inâ€‘memory representations of log groups, streams, events, destinations, export tasks, queries, resource policies and subscription filters, together with CRUD operations, filtering, pagination, tagging and CloudFormation integration.
business_intent: Enable developers to test applications that interact with CloudWatch Logs without contacting real AWS services by simulating the full set of log management APIs.
